thig7.1:1.3: As they nourish wife and children,
thig7.1:2.1: Work your way through the teaching of the Buddha,
thig7.1:2.2: and you will have no regrets.
thig7.1:2.4: and sit down on one side.

thig7.1:4.4: and sat down on one side.
thig7.1:5.1: In the first watch of the night,
thig7.1:5.3: In the second watch of the night,
thig7.1:6.1: In the third watch of the night,
thig7.1:6.2: I destroyed this mass of darkness.
thig7.1:6.3: I emerged from that possessing three knowledges:
thig7.1:7.1: Just as the thirty Devas honor Sakka,
thig7.1:7.4: possessing three superhuman knowledges, free from influences.”
